mapper.delete: delete from course where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into course (tid, cname, cost, location, description, count) values (#{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update course set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cid, tid, cname, cost, location, description, count from course

select mc.*, com.context from (SELECT ca.*, co.coach_name AS coachName FROM (SELECT c.*, a.sid, a.ctime, a.setTime, a.appointment, a.appointok, a.clockin, a.prohibit, a.punch FROM course c, apply a WHERE a.sid = #{sid} AND c.cid = a.cid) AS ca LEFT JOIN coach AS co ON ca.tid = co.tid) as mc left join comment as com on mc.sid = com.sid and mc.cid = com.cid
select c.context, u.username from comment c, users u where cid = #{cid} and c.sid = u.sid
